text:
Today we're learning English with the ever so 
talented actor singer, dancer and all-round good

bloke Hugh Jackman my fellow Australian is one 
of the most versatile actors having played the

iconic Wolverine, a role for which he holds the 
Guinness World Record for longest career as a

live-action Marvel superhero. In this lesson you 
will watch an interview and a performance by him

learn some vocabulary and then have the chance 
at the end to watch it without subtitles with a

little quiz. in fact I was reading the comments 
on one of our other videos and saw this lovely

message from Igor and he says that our method 
of teaching is effective and that he can now

watch without subtitles understanding most words. 
That's so nice to hear Igor. So be like Igor and

join our community. We help our global Community 
understand their favorite TV shows and movies

without getting lost, without missing the jokes 
and without subtitles so to join us all you

need to do is hit that subscribe button and the 
bell down below to continue learning with us.

So in this example Chandler made fun of Joey. 
Did you get the joke? This is a caterpillar.

So as one of Joey's eyebrows is so thin 
and they are next to each other he says

that one looks like the mum and the other 
looks like the little kid going after her.

Learning with Friends is fun right? So if you 
want to be able to understand other jokes while

watching your favorite TV series then our Fluent 
with Friends Course is the right thing for you.

In our 48 week course you'll learn with the 
first two seasons of Friends. Every week you will

receive PDF Power Lessons, vocabulary Memorization 
Software, Lifetime access to our Fluency Circle

Global Community and so much more! And today 
you can try it for free with our Three-part

Masterclass! To get started all you need to do is 
click up here or down in the description below.

Wow we are about to hit 4 million followers here 
on the Learn English with TV Series Channel and to

celebrate we are giving away for free our complete 
Fluent with Friends Premium Course. To participate

for your chance to win the course head on over 
to our Instagram at reallife.english. Good luck!

You know that contractions help you to speak 
faster right? So if you want some other tips

on how you can speak faster then check out this 
lesson that I made over on our Real Life English

YouTube Channel. You can watch it next by 
clicking up here or down in the description below!

I hope you enjoyed learning with Hugh 
Jackman today! Now are you ready to

watch without subtitles and answer some 
quiz questions? Come on let's get it.
